Tutorials

Jupyter notebook examples

Example on muller potential
Example on quadruple-well potential

Start with python script

python ./ts-dar/scripts/train_tsdar.py \
    --seed 1 \
    --device 'cpu' \
    --lag_time 10 \
    --encoder_sizes 2 20 20 20 10 2 \
    --feat_dim 2 \
    --n_states 2 \
    --beta 0.01 \
    --gamma 1 \
    --proto_update_factor 0.5 \
    --scaling_temperature 0.1 \
    --learning_rate 0.001 \
    --pretrain 10 \
    --n_epochs 20 \
    --train_split 0.9 \
    --train_batch_size 1000 \
    --data_directory ./ts-dar/data/quadruple-well \
    --saving_directory .

Or

sh ./ts-dar/scripts/train_tsdar.sh
